about.title: About Legal Template Generator | A SELISE Group AG Initiative
about.description: Discover the mission behind Legal Template Generator, a free subsidiary initiative of SELISE Group AG focused on delivering plain-English legal documents to everyone.
about.heading: Legal clarity for every growing team.
about.subheading: Legal Template Generator is a SELISE initiative dedicated to making professional contracts available to anyone, anywhere, at zero cost. We convert complex legal structures into plain-English documents you can trust from your first hire through global expansion.
about.whatGuidesDescription: Every release centers on accessibility, clarity, and confidence. These pillars keep the experience pragmatic and ready for real-world legal workflows.

accessibleByDesign.title: Accessible by Design
accessibleByDesign.description: We remove friction from standard agreements so founders, operators, and HR leaders get compliant paperwork without legal gatekeeping.

groundedInLegalCraft.title: Grounded in Legal Craft
groundedInLegalCraft.description: Each template follows industry-aligned structures with clear guidance, so you understand every clause you sign or share.

humanSupportNetwork.title: Human Support Network
humanSupportNetwork.description: Need more than a template? Our SELISE network connects you to specialists who can extend, localize, or operationalize what you generate.

about.poweredByDescription: SELISE Group AG is a global digital engineering partner headquartered in Switzerland, known for delivering outcomes through the Design-Implement-Operate (DIO) model. Legal Template Generator extends that mission by translating years of regulatory experience into instant, self-serve solutions for teams that need to move quickly without sacrificing compliance.

alwaysFree.title: Always Free
alwaysFree.description: No paywalls, upcharges, or aggressive upsells. Your organization keeps control from draft to signature.

plainLanguageFirst.title: Plain-Language First
plainLanguageFirst.description: We translate legal formality into plain English while preserving the obligations you need to stay protected.

privacyRespectful.title: Privacy-Respectful
privacyRespectful.description: Documents render client-side. We never retain your answers or generated files unless you explicitly opt in.

about.globalFootprintDescription: With teams spanning Europe, the Middle East, and Asia, SELISE blends regulatory expertise with engineering depth. This reach lets us keep templates relevant across jurisdictions while sharing best practices gathered from enterprise programs.
about.multidisciplinaryTeams: Multidisciplinary teams aligned to your region and time zone
about.experienceSpanning: Experience spanning regulated industries, scale-ups, and public sector
about.governancePractices: Governance practices rooted in privacy, resilience, and clarity
about.dioDescription: SELISE's Design-Implement-Operate methodology ensures the generator evolves alongside regulations, technology, and the realities of running a business. Pace without breaking things.

design.title: Design
design.description: We co-create journeys with legal advisors and operational teams to map real approval paths, regional nuances, and stakeholder needs.

implement.title: Implement
implement.description: Engineering sprints stack automation, validation, and performance monitoring so legal content remains dependable at scale.

operate.title: Operate
operate.description: Continuous updates, feedback loops, and analytics keep templates aligned with regulatory shifts and business growth.

about.believeHeading: We believe legal confidence should be default
about.believeDescription: Whether you are hiring your first employee, protecting IP, or formalizing strategic partnerships, Legal Template Generator keeps the barriers low and the standards high. Consider it your starting point‚Äîfree today, free tomorrow.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions | Legal Template Generator
faq.description: Find answers about how the Legal Template Generator works, what makes it free, and how SELISE Group AG keeps your documents private and dependable.
faq.heading: Answers to keep you moving with confidence.
faq.subheading: Legal Template Generator removes the friction from standard agreements. Explore the most common questions about how we stay free, how SELISE safeguards your information, and how to get help from a human if you need it.
faq.stillNeedHelpDescription: Chat with our support team for walkthroughs, enterprise rollouts, or specialized clauses. SELISE advisors can jump in when you need regional nuance or deeper automation.

gettingStarted.title: Using the generator
gettingStarted.description: Everything you need to know to go from idea to ready-to-download template in minutes.

howFast.question: How fast can I generate a document?
howFast.answer: Most templates are ready in under three minutes. The guided questions collect core facts, render the clauses client-side, and produce both a preview and downloadable PDF immediately.

needAccount.question: Do I need to create an account?
needAccount.answer: No. Legal Template Generator is intentionally frictionless. Open the template you need, answer the prompts, and export your document‚Äîno registration, credit card, or emails required.

fileFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
fileFormats.answer: We currently provide high-resolution PDF downloads optimized for sharing and e-signature. Structured DOCX exports are on the roadmap and will follow once formatting parity is guaranteed.

trustAccuracy.title: Legal quality and privacy
trustAccuracy.description: Why you can rely on our templates and how we safeguard every answer you provide.

legallyBinding.question: Are the templates legally binding?
legallyBinding.answer: Our templates mirror industry-standard structures crafted with SELISE legal specialists. However, enforceability always depends on local law and proper execution. When in doubt, have counsel review for jurisdiction-specific needs.

dataHandled.question: How is my data handled?
dataHandled.answer: Your inputs stay in your browser session. We never store template responses or generated documents unless you explicitly choose to share them with us. Analytics are anonymized to understand feature usage, not document content.

regionSpecific.question: Do templates include region-specific clauses?
regionSpecific.answer: Yes. We bake in conditional language for common jurisdictions and highlight where localized counsel should validate. As regulations shift, SELISE's global compliance team updates those clauses and publishes release notes.

beyondTemplate.title: Working with SELISE
beyondTemplate.description: How the broader SELISE ecosystem helps when you need more than a self-serve document.

seliseReview.question: Can SELISE review my completed document?
seliseReview.answer: Absolutely. Our advisory partners can audit, localize, or customize any generated agreement. Reach out via the contact form and we'll connect you with the right expert squad.

esignature.question: Do you offer e-signature or workflow tools?
esignature.answer: Yes. SELISE Signature integrates directly with our templates for drag-and-drop signature placement, automated reminders, and audit trails. The integration roadmap is published in our updates section.

templateNotListed.question: What if I need a template that's not listed?
templateNotListed.answer: Use the request form and tell us what you need. We prioritize based on demand and regulatory urgency, then ship new templates with clear changelogs so you always know what's new.

step1.title: Company & role details
step1.subtitle: Tell us about the employer and the position
step1.companyLegalNameHelp: The full legal name of the employing entity
step1.companyAddressHelp: Full address including city, state/province, and country
step1.jobTitleHelp: Official job title for this position
step1.jobResponsibilitiesHelp: Key duties and responsibilities - helps us provide better salary benchmarks
step1.analyzingDescription: Detecting jurisdiction, company details, and role requirements
step1.jurisdictionDetectedDescription: We'll apply local labor standards and legal requirements automatically.
step1.equityCompensationTypical: üí° Equity compensation is typical for this role
step1.stillAnalyzing: Still analyzing jurisdiction and role in the background...
step1.helpText: Once you provide these details, we'll automatically analyze the jurisdiction, role, and compensation benchmarks to prepare smart defaults for the rest of the form.
step1.errorContinue: You can continue with manual entry.

step2.title: Now for the employee
step2.subtitle: Personal information about the new hire
step2.employeeFullNameHelp: Full legal name as it should appear on the agreement
step2.employeeAddressHelp: Full residential address of the employee
step2.reportsToHelp: The name and title of the employee's direct supervisor
step2.stillAnalyzing: Still analyzing jurisdiction and role in the background...

step3Work.title: Work arrangement
step3Work.subtitle: Where and when will they work?
step3Work.homeBaseHelp: Location for tax and legal purposes (not required to work from here)
step3Work.officeLocationHelp: Office location where employee will work on-site days
step3Work.primaryWorkLocationHelp: City and state/country where employee will primarily work
step3Work.customWorkScheduleHelp: Specify custom work days and hours if different from standard
step3Work.overtimeEligible: Employee is eligible for overtime pay

step3Signing.title: Signing information
step3Signing.subtitle: Who will sign this agreement?
step3Signing.companyRepresentativeDescription: The authorized person who will sign on behalf of {companyName}
step3Signing.representativeNameHelp: Full name of the company representative
step3Signing.representativeTitleHelp: Their official title or role in the company
step3Signing.representativeEmailHelp: Email address to receive the signature request
step3Signing.employeeEmailHelp: Email address to receive the signature request
step3Signing.emailsCannotMatch: Employee and employer emails cannot be the same
step3Signing.emailsCannotMatchSuggestion: Please use different email addresses for the employee and company representative
step3Signing.signatureProcess: üìß Signature Process: Both parties will receive an email with a link to electronically sign the agreement once it's generated.

step4.title: Compensation
step4.subtitle: Base salary and pay structure
step4.salaryWillShow: ‚úì Salary will show as "[TO BE DETERMINED]" in the document
step4.salaryWillBeOmitted: ‚úì Salary will be omitted from the document

step5.title: Benefits & equity
step5.subtitle: Additional compensation and perks
step5.equityTypical: üí° Equity is typical for this role
step5.equityOfferedHelp: Describe equity grant (e.g., stock options, RSUs, percentage)
step5.equityLessCommon: Equity compensation is less common for this role. You can skip this section or add if needed.
step5.paidTimeOffHelp: Number of PTO days per year

step6.title: Legal terms
step6.subtitle: Protective clauses and jurisdiction
step6.governingLawHelp: Which jurisdiction's law governs this agreement

step7.title: Review details
step7.subtitle: Confirm the information you've supplied before moving to final confirmations.
step7.title: Title
step7.allTermsAlign: All terms align with market standards for this role and jurisdiction.
step7.allSet: All set? Click Continue to complete the quick confirmations before generating your agreement.

step8.title: Before we generate
step8.subtitle: Confirm these quick items while your draft finishes preparing.
step8.draftReadyDescription: We already prepared this agreement in the background. Once you complete the items below, we will open it instantly.
step8.preparingDescription: We are refreshing the agreement behind the scenes. Confirm these details while it finishes.
step8.willTryAgainDescription: The background draft ran into an issue. We will generate a fresh copy when you continue.
step8.draftUpdatingDescription: We noticed new details. Hang tight while we refresh the agreement automatically.
step8.legalDisclaimer: These templates are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute legal advice.
step8.aiAcknowledgment: I understand this agreement was generated by AI and I will review the contract carefully before use.

legalDisclaimer.notLegalAdviceText: These templates are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute legal advice.
legalDisclaimer.switzerlandBasedText: This is a Switzerland-based product that may not be compliant with laws in your jurisdiction or state.
legalDisclaimer.aiGeneratedText: AI is inaccurate by nature. Always consult a qualified legal advisor to review this document before signing.
legalDisclaimer.jurisdictionDisclaimerText: This is a Switzerland-based product. The templates provided may not be compliant with the specific laws, regulations, or requirements of your jurisdiction, state, or country. Laws vary significantly by location and change over time.
legalDisclaimer.professionalReviewRequiredText: You must consult with a qualified legal advisor admitted to practice in your relevant jurisdiction to review, modify, and approve any document before you sign or use it. Do not rely on these templates without proper legal counsel.
legalDisclaimer.acknowledgment: By using this service, you acknowledge that you understand these limitations and agree to seek appropriate legal counsel before using any generated documents.
